text:
e="preserve">Hamid Kahram () (1958–19 March 2020) was an Iranian politician and veterinarian. He was a member of the Iranian Parliament representing Ahwaz between 2000 and 2004. He was also the Director General of Scholarships Office and Student Exchange, Ministry of Science, Research and Technology.
Kahram died of the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) on 19 March 2020 in Tehran, aged 62.
